law.full_text:
FINANCIAL OBLIGATIONS REQUIREMENTS NOT PROHIBITED. (Added By Ord. No. 153,406, Eff. 3/8/80.)
This article shall not prohibit the person having a housing accommodation for rent or lease or any authorized agent or employee of such person from requiring the same financial obligation from all prospective tenants. However, no discrimination in the amount or manner of payment of said financial obligation shall be permitted based upon age, parenthood, pregnancy, or the potential or actual tenancy of a minor child.
